plot: Set in post-apocalyptic 2038, It's a bleak frozen July. Food is running out. The Hunter(Sam Mills) sets out to find some food for himself and his sick brother. Food is not all he finds.
title: July 2038
plot_es: Set in post-apocalyptic 2038, It's a bleak frozen July. Food is running out. The Hunter(Sam Mills) sets out to find some food for himself and his sick brother. Food is not all he finds.
plot_en: Set in post-apocalyptic 2038, It's a bleak frozen July. Food is running out. The Hunter(Sam Mills) sets out to find some food for himself and his sick brother. Food is not all he finds.
